name: WG: Story Mode - Interactive.
description:
The Continuation of the Adventures of Wallace & Groomit.

Huyaknows Series AT (A.k.a Limited Picture).

The interactive choices you design affect your story.

Episode One: "A Portal to Mystery" [Minisode]

Wallace has built a new device and it's a portal. He decides to go there with Groomit but will quickly understand that they have to get out of there as soon as possible.

Episode Two : "Day at Muzzled"

This Episode has no End.

A New Fair has been built so Wallace & Groomit go there, where we can build Attractions and test Attractions. But this Fair hides a terrible secret.

Aardman's (2022)©

Huyaknows Games Series SA.

An Interactive Story on Android.
